attributes.action: Coventry needs a building to access all addiction services in one place
attributes.background: We at Coventry Recovery Community feel that a hub is needed in our city. where people can access all services of drug and alcohol addiction, mental and physical abuse , mental health services aswell as general help and support. other cities offer this service. lets get our voices heard in Coventry.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
